# Aesthetics To Go
# The Clinical Operating System for Mobile Aesthetic Providers

## About
Aesthetics To Go is a mobile-first clinical platform for licensed
Physician Assistants (PA-Cs), Nurse Practitioners (NPs), and MDs/DOs
who deliver concierge aesthetic treatments at patients' homes and offices.

## Key Facts
- Zero monthly subscription fees for providers
- Zero merchant processing fees (100% payout retention)
- Full mobile EHR with HIPAA-compliant SOAP charting
- AI diagnostic simulator for patient visualization
- Volume wholesale pricing on medical supplies
- Launching in Las Vegas, NV metro area

## Services Facilitated
- Botox and neurotoxin injections
- Dermal fillers (lips, cheeks, jawline)
- Hair restoration treatments

## For Providers
Licensed aesthetic providers can join the platform to build a mobile
concierge practice with no overhead, full clinical tools, and
complete professional autonomy.

## Contact
- Website: https://aestheticstogo.com
- Email: info@aestheticstogo.com
